T02TD1299E:196a-1: ba lim karma kra ma n'a ma /
T02TD1299E:196a-3: gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1299E:196a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1299E:196a-5: bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-6: de yi chos skyong srung ma la //
T02TD1299E:196a-7: bzod gsol don du 'dud pa dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-8: rgyu yi phyir kyang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1299E:196a-9: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-10: snga ma'i lan chags bral ba dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-11: 'phral gyi bar chad nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02TD1299E:196a-12: gtor ma rgyun du gtang bar bya //
T02TD1299E:196a-13: tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-14: phrin las rnam bzhi rtsom pa dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-15: dbang bskur chen po byed pa'i tshe //
T02TD1299E:196a-16: gtor ma'i rim pa 'di ltar bya //
T02TD1299E:196a-17: yo byad dang ni bca' thabs dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-18: dgod rim dang yang byin rlabs dang //
T02TD1299E:196a-19: dbul dang dbang bskur dgye ba bdun //
T02TD1299E:196a-20: las kyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1299E:196a-21: sha dang bdud rtsi zas lnga dang //
T02TD1299E:196b-0: @196b gzhan yang bza' btung sna tshogs te //
T02TD1299E:196b-1: gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun la //
T02TD1299E:196b-2: mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bya //
T02TD1299E:196b-3: mdor na sna tshogs pa yi rdzas //
T02TD1299E:196b-4: sdig pa med cing gnod pa med //
T02TD1299E:196b-5: yo byad dam par 'di bshad do //
T02TD1299E:196b-6: gzhan yang gtor ma chen po ni //
T02TD1299E:196b-7: shin tu che ba'i snod dag tu //
T02TD1299E:196b-8: mchod pa'i bye brag kha zas kyis //
T02TD1299E:196b-9: khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu //
T02TD1299E:196b-10: aa shvadtha yi shing dag la //
T02TD1299E:196b-11: gru gsum phyag rgya byas te gzhag / gru gsum rtse la mar me gsum //
T02TD1299E:196b-12: nyin mtshan rtag tu gtang bar bya //
T02TD1299E:196b-13: de ru 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang //
T02TD1299E:196b-14: gdugs dang phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag /
T02TD1299E:196b-15: de yi dbus su zan kham gsum //
T02TD1299E:196b-16: steng du bha ndha mtshan bzangs dag / khrag chen dag gis gang ba gzhag / gzhan yang mdzes pa'i snod dag tu //
T02TD1299E:196b-17: khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu //
T02TD1299E:196b-18: 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gdugs rnams gzugs //
T02TD1299E:196b-19: mar me gcig kyang rtag tu gtang //
T02TD1299E:196b-20: mkha' 'gro ma dang phyogs skyong ni //
T02TD1299E:196b-21: mdzes pa'i snod du rdzas rnams kyis //
T02TD1299E:196b-22: legs par bkang ste gzhag par bya //
T02TD1299E:196b-23: tshogs dang tshogs kyi rol pa yin //
T02TD1299E:196b-24: lhag ma dag la lhag ma bya //
T02TD1299E:196b-25: kun kyang gcan gzan rjes bzhin nam //
T02TD1299E:196b-26: las kyi dbyibs dang sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1299E:196b-27: chang dang khrag dang chu yis sbyang //
T02TD1299E:196b-28: gtor chen rtsa ba'i dbus su gzhag / yang na byang shar mtshams su gzhag / lhag ma lho yi phyogs su'o //
T02TD1299E:196b-29: phyogs skyong shar te mkha' 'gro nub //
T02TD1299E:196b-30: shin tu lhag ma mdun nam byang //
T02TD1299E:196b-31: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02TD1299E:196b-32: aa las snod kyi nang dag tu //
T02TD1299E:196b-33: aam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD1299E:196b-34: de yi dbus dang phyogs mtshams su //
T02TD1299E:196b-37: dri chu dri chen khrag dang ga bur shel //
T02TD1299E:196b-38: mi dang ba lang khyi glang rta //
T02TD1299E:196b-39: de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam //
T02TD1299E:196b-40: de las rigs lnga yab yum bsam //
T02TD1299E:196b-41: de steng aom las zla ba ste //
T02TD1299E:196b-42: de steng h'um las rdo rje bsam //
T02TD1299E:196b-43: phat kyis bud cing 'bar ba dang //
T02TD1299E:196b-44: bsros te dros pas yab yum rol //
T02TD1299E:196b-45: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1299E:196b-46: phyogs bcu dag na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1299E:196b-47: bde gshegs ye shes byang chub sems //
T02TD1299E:196b-48: sems can rnams kyi bkrag gzi mdangs //
T02TD1299E:196b-49: rtsi shing nags tshal bcud bsdus te //
T02TD1299E:197a-0: @197a * // slar yang ji bzhin dgug par bya //
T02TD1299E:197a-1: thim nas thams cad 'od du zhu //
T02TD1299E:197a-2: aom a'a: h'um gis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1299E:197a-3: las kyi skabs la bab pa dang //
T02TD1299E:197a-4: gtor chen bhandha'i nang du ni //
T02TD1299E:197a-5: sgrub thabs gzhung bzhin bsgoms nas su //
T02TD1299E:197a-6: de yi phyi rim par khyams la //
T02TD1299E:197a-7: lha brgyad 'khor bcas mos pas bsgom //
T02TD1299E:197a-8: gnyis pa la ni phyogs skyong dang //
T02TD1299E:197a-9: de bzhin gsum par klu chen brgyad //
T02TD1299E:197a-10: 'khor dang bcas pa mos pas so //
T02TD1299E:197a-11: tshogs kyi rdzas rnams drangs pa la //
T02TD1299E:197a-12: bsang gtor byas te byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1299E:197a-13: phud spros padma'i phyag rgyas blang //
T02TD1299E:197a-14: sngags 'di brjod cing dbul bar bya //
T02TD1299E:197a-15: aom ae hye hi badzra ai dam ba lim kh'a hi /
T02TD1299E:197a-16: lha rnams kun la de bzhin dbul //
T02TD1299E:197a-17: bsrung ba'i dbang sngags brjod cing dbul //
T02TD1299E:197a-18: bstod cing rdo rje glu yang blang //
T02TD1299E:197a-19: de nas lhag ma'i phud spros te //
T02TD1299E:197a-20: gru gsum zla ba'i steng dag tu //
T02TD1299E:197a-21: bdag nyid kye yi rdo rjer bsgom //
T02TD1299E:197a-22: de yi khyams la mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1299E:197a-23: 'khor dang bcas pa mos pas bsam //
T02TD1299E:197a-24: gnyis pa la ni dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1299E:197a-25: gzhan yang 'gro ba ris drug dang //
T02TD1299E:197a-26: dmigs kyi yul gyi lha 'dre rnams //
T02TD1299E:197a-27: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas su //
T02TD1299E:197a-36: na ya sim ga / aa ya de /
T02TD1299E:197a-43: pasna ki / byi na ya ki / bhi pa sa tri /
T02TD1299E:197a-50: sarba tirya ka / sarba pre ta ka / sarba na ra ka //
T02TD1299E:197a-54: mos pa'i tshul du spyan drangs mchod //
T02TD1299E:197a-55: padma'i phyag rgyas blangs la dbus //
T02TD1299E:197a-63: dra rtsa ba ta ga te /
T02TD1299E:197a-69: sam burnam/ ai dam ba lim bhum dza tha /
T02TD1299E:197a-70: gri hna tha sa ma ya raksha tha ma ma sarba aa the /
T02TD1299E:197a-75: yi shra trashta sham / raksha sarbam /
T02TD1299E:197a-80: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:197a-83: ma ma sarba sa pa ri /
T02TD1299E:197a-84: sa ta su kham bi sho dha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:197b-0: @197b h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:197b-1: rol mo'i sgra dang rdo rje glu blangs te /
T02TD1299E:197b-2: lhag ma'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1299E:197b-3: bdag nyid dkyes rdor rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1299E:197b-5: rim par dkar nag dmar po'o //
T02TD1299E:197b-6: de yang yig 'bru gsum las bsgom //
T02TD1299E:197b-7: lha dang phyogs skyong klu chen brgyad //
T02TD1299E:197b-8: aom a'a: h'um las pad mdog bzhin //
T02TD1299E:197b-9: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdor dril 'chad //
T02TD1299E:197b-10: rang gi yum yang de bzhin te //
T02TD1299E:197b-11: brkyang bskum tshul gyis kun kyang gnas //
T02TD1299E:197b-12: sa bon las ni 'od zer spro //
T02TD1299E:197b-13: gzugs dang gzugs med lha brgyad la //
T02TD1299E:197b-14: 'dod khams lha mi phyogs skyong ste //
T02TD1299E:197b-15: ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin //
T02TD1299E:197b-16: klu chen brgyad la bstim par bya //
T02TD1299E:197b-17: bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02TD1299E:197b-18: phyag rgya bzhi yis sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1299E:197b-19: rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te //
T02TD1299E:197b-20: phyi nang gsang bas mchod bya ste //
T02TD1299E:197b-21: lha dang phyogs skyong klu brgyad la //
T02TD1299E:197b-22: rnam snang mi bskyod mtha' yas kyis //
T02TD1299E:197b-23: rim pa ji bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1299E:197b-25: padma'i phyag rgyas blangs nas su //
T02TD1299E:197b-26: aom ainda ya ma dza la /
T02TD1299E:197b-27: yaksha dza: h'um bam ho: bh'u ta bahin /
T02TD1299E:197b-35: ai dam ba lim bhum dza /
T02TD1299E:197b-36: dzi gha mam sa dh'u pam pushpe d'i pam /
T02TD1299E:197b-45: aom aa k'a ro mu kham /
T02TD1299E:197b-49: rdo rje glu dang rol mo'i sgras //
T02TD1299E:197b-50: mchod de nyin mo lan gsum gtang //
T02TD1299E:197b-51: yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1299E:197b-52: mchod pa'i rdzas la bsang gtor brlab //
T02TD1299E:197b-53: 'dab brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la //
T02TD1299E:197b-64: brjod pa tsam gyis dmigs byas te //
T02TD1299E:197b-66: gru chad la ni khams gsum gyi //
T02TD1299E:197b-67: gtso bo thams cad bsam par bya //
T02TD1299E:197b-68: khyams la 'khor rnams thams cad do //
T02TD1299E:197b-70: kun kyang sku gsung thugs dang ldan //
T02TD1299E:197b-71: bha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca' //
T02TD1299E:197b-72: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD1299E:198a-1: drangs bstims la bar chod bgegs //
T02TD1299E:198a-3: aom na ma: samanta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra ni /
T02TD1299E:198a-4: na mo badzra kro dha ya /
T02TD1299E:198a-5: ma h'a dam shottaa ka ta /
T02TD1299E:198a-7: aa si mu sh'u la parshu p'a sha hast'a ya /
T02TD1299E:198a-8: aom aa mri ta ku nda li /
T02TD1299E:198a-16: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02TD1299E:198a-17: bi spho ta ya bi sphogs ya /
T02TD1299E:198a-18: sarba bighn'a na bi n'a ya n'am /
T02TD1299E:198a-20: bi bi tanta ka r'a ya /
T02TD1299E:198a-21: sarba goo r'i au pa tha ba sa ma nam /
T02TD1299E:198a-22: ku ru ku ru h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:198a-23: de ltar bdud rtsis mtshams bcad nas //
T02TD1299E:198a-24: padma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma dbul //
T02TD1299E:198a-26: aom a'a ra li ho: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD1299E:198a-27: badzrad'a ki na ma: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1299E:198a-29: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1299E:198a-32: pi sh'a tsa aushma nda aa pa smar /
T02TD1299E:198a-34: ai dam ba lim gri hnantu /
T02TD1299E:198a-35: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstshandu /
T02TD1299E:198a-43: ma ma sarba pa ri pu ka / ta ta su ka bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:198a-53: bi se sa ta ba dza ni /
T02TD1299E:198a-54: thang la ga te bu mo /
T02TD1299E:198a-61: kre na kar la pi pa dzi /
T02TD1299E:198a-63: bi na ya ka / tsa mundi /
T02TD1299E:198a-73: aom a'a: mam h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1299E:198a-74: de ltar phul te gsol ba dang //
T02TD1299E:198a-75: se gol brdab cing gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1299E:198a-76: aom kri to ba sarbba sa tv'artha /
T02TD1299E:198a-77: siddhi ma datt'a th'a nu ga /
T02TD1299E:198a-78: gatstsha tv'am bu ddh'a bi sha yam /
T02TD1299E:198a-79: pu ne re ga ma na yatstsha /
T02TD1299E:198a-80: rang rang gnas su yud tsam gyis //
T02TD1299E:198a-81: phyin te rnal 'byor bsgo ba nyan //
T02TD1299E:198a-82: de ltar mtshan mo lan gsum gtang //
T02TD1299E:198a-83: yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1299E:198a-84: lce la rdo rje bsgom byas te //
T02TD1299E:198a-85: lha'am chos nyid rol bsams na //
T02TD1299E:198a-87: rnal 'byor rol pa'i lhag ma la //
T02TD1299E:198a-88: shin tu lhag ma'i gtor ma bya //
T02TD1299E:198a-89: lte bar bdag nyid yi dam bsgom //
T02TD1299E:198a-90: pre ta brjod cing zur drug la //
T02TD1299E:198a-91: yi dgas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1299E:198a-92: aom au tsishta aa dhi tishta bh'u dza de bi tha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1299E:198b-0: sdug bsngal @198b bral zhing tshim par bsam //
T02TD1299E:198b-1: sgrub pa'i zhag grangs thon pa dang //
T02TD1299E:198b-2: slob ma'i mgo steng gtor ma gzhag / rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob pa dang //
T02TD1299E:198b-3: phrin las bzhi yi dbang thob bsam //
T02TD1299E:198b-4: sum mdo'am lam ka'i bzhi mdo'am //
T02TD1299E:198b-5: dur khrod yang na chu 'gram du //
T02TD1299E:198b-6: nam phyed na ni gtor ma gtang //
T02TD1299E:198b-7: byang shar mtshams su gtor chen bskyal //
T02TD1299E:198b-8: mdor na gnas pa'i go rims kyis //
T02TD1299E:198b-9: skyel ba'i sa ru phyin pa dang //
T02TD1299E:198b-10: phyogs phyogs gdon rnams zil mnan phyir //
T02TD1299E:198b-11: phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas te //
T02TD1299E:198b-12: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol //
T02TD1299E:198b-13: lag pa g-yon nas g-yas su bsgyur //
T02TD1299E:198b-14: rkang pa g-yon nas g-yas su brdab //
T02TD1299E:198b-16: long mo gshibs te 'gying bag gis //
T02TD1299E:198b-17: 'gyur zhing g-yon du bgrad cing blta //
T02TD1299E:198b-18: rang sngags gdon cing dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD1299E:198b-19: rdo rje'i glu yang drag tu blang //
T02TD1299E:198b-20: rol mo'i sgra yang drag tu brdung //
T02TD1299E:198b-21: 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi gzhung //
T02TD1299E:198b-22: rgyud rnams dang ni 'gal ba med //
T02TD1299E:198b-23: gdams ngag rim pa 'di bris pas //
T02TD1299E:198b-24: lhag chad nor pa ci mchis pa //
T02TD1299E:198b-25: dkon mchog bla ma chos skyong dang //
T02TD1299E:198b-26: mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1299E:198b-27: rmongs pa rnams la mig phye bas //
T02TD1299E:198b-28: las kyi gzhung bsrangs dge rtsa gang //
T02TD1299E:198b-29: bdag dang rnal 'byor thams cad dang //
T02TD1299E:198b-30: sems can kun gyi don du bsngo //
T02TD1299E:198b-31: slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
